name: ATTACK DRONE BATTLE
description:
Attack drone battle is a top down drone killer game.
in this game the player can update her drone power, gun and bomb or buy some drone to attack enemies and win levels.He win the level when he kill more drones enemies in the scene.

This is a free game, the player can buy all of content on this game with a game coin he win in some levels or when he waching video.

Attack drone battle is fun action top down 2d drone killer game
